title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world Tuesday
description: A small number of MPs will be back in Ottawa today, a day after provincial governments in Ontario and Quebec issued orders calling for the closure of non-essential businesses, saying the measures are needed to slow the spread of the novel coronavirus. Here's …
content:
The latest: 
A small number of MPs will be back in Ottawa today, a day after provincial governments in Ontario and Quebec issued orders calling for the closure of non-essential businesses in an effort to slow the spread of the novel coronavirus.
